name: XCTestObservation
desc: A protocol that defines methods the test runner calls in response to significant events during test runs.

items.name: func testBundleWillStart(Bundle)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately before any tests in a test bundle begin.

items.name: func testSuiteWillStart(XCTestSuite)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately before a test suite begins executing.

items.name: func testCaseWillStart(XCTestCase)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately before a test case begins executing.

items.name: func testCase(XCTestCase, didRecord: XCTIssue)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test case reports an issue.

items.name: func testCase(XCTestCase, didRecord: XCTExpectedFailure)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test case records an expected failure.

items.name: func testCaseDidFinish(XCTestCase)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately after a test case finishes executing.

items.name: func testSuite(XCTestSuite, didRecord: XCTIssue)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test suite reports an issue.

items.name: func testSuite(XCTestSuite, didRecord: XCTExpectedFailure)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test suite records an expected failure.

items.name: func testSuiteDidFinish(XCTestSuite)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately after a test suite finishes executing.

items.name: func testBundleDidFinish(Bundle)
items.desc: Notifies the observer immediately after all tests in a test bundle finish executing.
